fields.name: Perks:
fields.value:
Vile purge: Another $150 is paid 5 turns after collecting rent.
Corrupt purge: Rent is tripled.
Infection: Rent is payed when another player passes the space owner as well.
Mori: Rent is tripled again; **Vile Purge** is raised to $300.

Perks cost $200 each; **Mori** may only be bought after all 3 others have been purchased, but the other 3 may be bought in any order.
